trans-unit.source: Provides a glyph for an <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> to display when the activity associated with the designer cannot be modified.
trans-unit.target: 提供的字形<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>无法修改的设计器关联的活动时显示。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] An activity designer displays LockedActivityGlyph when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A> property is set to `true`.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]活动设计器显示 LockedActivityGlyph 时<xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A>属性设置为`true`。</xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.IsLocked%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> class.
Returns the bounds for the glyph on the specified <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回对指定的标志符号的边界<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> with which the glyph is associated.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate whether the glyph appears on the activity designer surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指示在活动设计器图面; 上是否显示标志符号否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"></xref> that represents the bounds for the glyph.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Rectangle"> </xref>表示的标志符号的边界。

trans-unit.source: designer contains a null reference ( in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: designer包含空引用 ( 在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Performs any tasks required to render the glyph on the activity designer surface.
trans-unit.target: 执行呈现活动设计器图面上的标志符号所需的任何任务。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"></xref> to perform fill and drawing tasks.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Drawing.Graphics"> </xref>用于执行填充和绘制任务。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to indicate that the glyph appears on the design surface; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>指示在设计图面，则上显示标志符号否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme"></xref> to use to access ambient property settings.
The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"></xref> from which to obtain information about user actions.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner"> </xref>从中获取有关用户操作的信息。

trans-unit.source: Gets the priority setting for the glyph on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: 获取活动设计图面上标志符号的优先级设置。

trans-unit.source: An integer value that represents the priority setting for the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref> on the activity design surface.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数值，表示的优先级设置<xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.LockedActivityGlyph"></xref>活动设计图面上。
